title: Hospitality Practical Skills Enhancement: Serverless-Based Machine Learning Design and Training Fundamentals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary programming knowledge and comprehension of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the interaction between the fundamental principles of serverless computing environments and machine learning training processes.
Analyze constraints (execution time, state management, etc.) encountered when training machine learning models on serverless platforms and propose solutions
Design and implement machine learning workflows that reflect budget and time constraints in real cloud environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
